subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees fought and clawed the way they often do, but they still fell to Boston as, at 12:53 a.m., Mike Napoli hit a two-out, full-count home run off Adam Warren.
snippet: The Yankees fought and clawed the way they often do, but they still fell to Boston as, at 12:53 a.m., Mike Napoli hit a two-out, full-count home run off Adam Warren.
